text: Ara yakhana musa phire elena tamra lokadera kache ksud'dha o trud'dha haye, tini balalena -- ''amara pare tomara amara sthale ya karecha ta jaghan'ya! Tomara ki tomadera prabhura bicara egiye anate ca'o?’’ Ara tini phalakagulo phele dilena, ara tamra bha'iyera matha dharalena tamra dike tamke tene anate. Tini balalena -- ''he amara sahodara! Nihsandeha lokera amake durbala tha'orechila o amake praya mere'i phelechila. Sutaram amara dasaya satrudera pulakita karo na, ara, amake papistha lokadera dalabhukta karo na.’’
